title: Biden and Obama Reunite in a Last-Ditch Effort to Save Their Party
description: A rally on Saturday in Philadelphia will be their first joint campaign appearance since President Biden took office, adding a twist to the relationship of what has always been a political odd couple.
dc:creator: Peter Baker
media:description: President Biden with former President Barack Obama. It comes as a bit of a bittersweet reality for Mr. Biden to have to depend on Mr. Obama, whose shadow he has sought to escape for years.
